description: The court said Karl-Heinz Grasser received kickbacks in return for information on property sales.
title: Austria: Former finance minister Grasser jailed for corruption
title_page: Austria: Former finance minister Grasser jailed for corruption - BBC News
maintext: She added that the winning bidder's success "was achieved through bribery and was only possible because of the intentional abuse of authority" by the former finance minister.
